TopicTitle: How do you actually install the Making History expansion?

Articles.Content: I can't figure out how to install the expansion. I already got it from the KSP store but I'm not sure what to do next. I'm on PC if it matters.

Just run the installer, and point it to your KSP 1.4.1 directory when prompted. 

If it works, the expansion should then be installed under <kspdirectory>\GameData\SquadExpansion\MakingHistory.

Edited March 13, 2018 by Frankenchokey
Me fail English? That's unpossible,

Just now, Frankenchokey said:

Just run the installer, and point it to your KSP 1.4.1 directory when prompted. 

If it works, thehe expansion should then me installed under <kspdirectory>\GameData\SquadExpansion\MakingHistory.

Thanks!

I dont use the launcher. 

I Unzipped the making history folder once downloaded. 

Unzipped the folder in the making history folder I just unzipped. (Yep a zipped folder in a zipped folder.)

Located the ‘GameData’ folder and open it. 

Located the ‘SquadExpansion’ folder. 

Copied  the ‘SquadExpansion’ folder and pasted it into the KSP 1.4.1 folder called ‘GameData’. 

I downloaded KSP making history for MacOS from from thekerbalspaceprogram.com store. I did the above and now am building my craft for the first mission in the new making history DLC mission builder.
I did not have the option to download the .zip for Windows.

I don't get here either. Just bought it ...

In Steam, in my library, the only entry is "Kerbal  Space Program". While selected, in the DLC window I see:

Item: Kerbal Space Program: Making History Expansion

Install: Not installed

Acquired: Added today

But where do I download it from!?
